Text:
I'm not surprised if this game doesn't work under Visa; seeing as most applications (games or otherwise) are incompatiable with Vista.

As for the game itself, very fun to play. One often finds oneself sitting and trying to find new combinations to kill our pieces off rather than actually trying to win the game.
